description: The current state of a StatefulSet.

collisionCount.description: The count of hash collisions for the StatefulSet. The StatefulSet controller uses this field as a collision avoidance mechanism when it needs to create the name for the newest controller revision. When updated, this field cannot be decremented.

conditions.description: The latest available observations of a statefulset's current state.

currentReplicas.description: The number of Pods created by the StatefulSet controller from the StatefulSet version indicated by `currentRevision`. Cannot be greater than `replicas`.

currentRevision.description: If not empty, indicates the version of the StatefulSet used to generate Pods in the sequence [0,`currentReplicas`).

observedGeneration.description: The most recent generation observed for this StatefulSet. It corresponds to the StatefulSet's generation, which is updated on mutation by the API Server.

readyReplicas.description: The number of Pods created by the StatefulSet controller that have a '`Ready`' condition. Cannot be greater than `replicas`.

replicas.description: The number of Pods created by the StatefulSet controller.

updateRevision.description: If not empty, indicates the version of the StatefulSet used to generate Pods in the sequence [`replicas-updatedReplicas`,`replicas`)

updatedReplicas.description: The number of Pods created by the StatefulSet controller from the StatefulSet version indicated by `updateRevision`. Cannot be greater than `replicas`.
